tool_description: Json utils is a restfull Api That exposes endpoints for working with Json data
name: Json Utils Api
title: Json Utils Api

api_list.name: generate json
api_list.description: This endpoint generate json file based on json schema
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://json-utils-api1.p.rapidapi.com/generate-json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "json-utils-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Json to xml
api_list.description: This endpoint converts Json file to Xml

api_list.name: Json validation
api_list.description:
This endpoint validates json files, it return True if its valid, False else.

The body request must be a Json file format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://json-utils-api1.p.rapidapi.com/validate_json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "json-utils-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
